Blair High School Choir Students Salute America
Over the last few years, the Blair High School Choirs, under the direction of Dan Hutsell, have performed the National Anthem at one of the home basketball games. This performance, from January 22nd, featured the over 200 choir members at Blair High School. This version of the National Anthem is an arrangement by Mr. Hutsell. Thanks to all for sharing your talents with the community!
